repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: First blank folio- title in granth at the centre Sacaritra(2 -3 letters are illegible as to sticker glued on it.) 52 is written in blue color. Two stickers with numbers 52 and 35-3360 respectively. Folio broken at the left side, and corners and edges are broken. Blank folio verso has probably a verse written but handwriting is sloppy so not legible. The verse on the blank folio is as follows: line1 śrīśrīnivāsamahādeśikādā(ṣṭa)labdha line 2 saṃcitānasyārādha(4-5 syllables illegible) yaṃ gṛhyaḥ line3 srīsaccaritrarakṣai Two folio with some text scribbled but without ink followed by one blank folio at the end. Number 52 mentioned on the last folio.

msItem.title: Sacaritrarakṣā
msItem.author: Vedāntadeśika
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ śrīmānveṃkaṭanāthāryakavītārkīkakesarī vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhatāṃ sadā hṛdi . cakrādilāñchanabhṛtssūdhṛ 1v 2 todhṛtordhvapuṇḍrān nyastātmano bhagavatścaraṇārvinde tadbhuktabhogarasikāntridivendra vandyānpuṃsaḥ pramāṇaśaraṇān śirasodvahāmaḥ
msItem.explicit: 47v 1 tārkīkasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmanveṃkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedācāryasya kṛtiṃ śrīsaccaritrarakṣāyāṃ bagavaniveditopayoga sādhikāṃ (3 illegible syllables) śrīmate śrīnivāsamahā 47v 2 deśikāya namaḥ srīmate śrīnivāsarāmānuja mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmatevedāntarāmānujamahādeśikāya namaḥ (2 illegible syllables) deśikamayaṃ śrīmate gopālā 47v 3 yya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntadeśikāya namaḥ āṃgirasa purṇīkāmāyāṃ ayaṃ graṃthaḥ śrīnivāsamahādeśikakṛpāla
msItem.finalRubric: 47v 3 ayaṃ graṃthaḥ śrīnivāsamahādeśikakṛpāla 47v 3 plava 47v 4 stu bhāve narāyaṇeṇa likhitaḥ hariḥ oṃ śūbhamastu śrīsatacaritrarakṣā saṃpurṇā

support.p: palm leaf is used as cover.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio and 6 blank folio, 47 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

origin.origDate: The completion statement says that manuscript was wirtten by Narāyaṇa Bhāve.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Inferred word is put in the square bracket.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ śrīmānveṃkaṭanāthāryakavītārkīkakesarī vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhatāṃ sadā hṛdi . cakrādilāñchanabhṛtssūdhṛ 1v 2 todhṛtordhvapuṇḍrān nyastātmano bhagavatścaraṇārvinde tadbhuktabhogarasikāntridivendra vandyānpuṃsaḥ pramāṇaśaraṇān śirasodvahāmaḥ
47v 1 tārkīkasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmanveṃkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedācāryasya kṛtiṃ śrīsaccaritrarakṣāyāṃ bagavaniveditopayoga sādhikāṃ (3 illegible syllables) śrīmate śrīnivāsamahā 47v 2 deśikāya namaḥ srīmate śrīnivāsarāmānuja mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmatevedāntarāmānujamahādeśikāya namaḥ (2 illegible syllables) deśikamayaṃ śrīmate gopālā 47v 3 yya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntadeśikāya namaḥ āṃgirasa purṇīkāmāyāṃ ayaṃ graṃthaḥ śrīnivāsamahādeśikakṛpāla plava 47v 4 stu bhāve narāyaṇeṇa likhitaḥ hariḥ oṃ śūbhamastu śrīsatacaritrarakṣā saṃpurṇā
